title: PMS 2.0 347 - Justin Herbert, JK Dobbins, Warrick Dunn, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys take some calls from around the globe to get a sense of where people are leaning in the Super Bowl, chat about which bets are starting to look more enticing, and everything else surrounding the Super Bowl. Also joining the show is the Pepsi Zero Sugar Rookie of the Year, Chargers QB, Justin Herbert to chat about his season, the situation surrounding his first start, when he knew he was going to be okay, what he's going to focus on this season heading into year 2, learning a new offense in the offseason and much more (42:45-57:12). Next, 55th overall pick in the 2020 NFL Draft, coming off a nine touchdown season, Ravens RB JK Dobbins joins the show to chat about his first season in the NFL, being the guy for the Ravens moving forward, playing with Lamar Jackson, and being patient in the NFL (59:04-1:11:50). Later, Joining Pat and AJ Hawk is 3x Pro Bowler, 1997 Offensive Rookie of the Year, 2004 Walter Payton Man of the Year, member of the Atlanta Falcons Ring of Honor, Warrick Dunn to chat about the work he's doing with the Walter Payton Man of the Year, his relationship with Bobby Bowden, and more (1:53:22-2:01:21). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
